text: Dr. Tamilisai Soundararajan (born 2 June 1961) is an Indian doctor and politician. She is the 2nd and current Governor of Telangana since September 2019 and is the Lieutenant Governor of Puducherry (Additional charge) since 18 February 2021.. She was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party until September 2019. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Telangana
title: Tamilisai Soundararajan
